name: The Pants of the King
description:
This is a game where you play as an Apprentice Tailor named Ambrose. He gets tasked with fixing The Pants of the King so that he can earn his promotion! However, once the pants get stolen he goes on a crazy adventure to find a way to get them back. 

No random battles, just a fun story and very mild puzzle solving/stealth. 

This is an old RPG Maker project I made a few years ago and figure it is time I get it uploaded to itch.io. 

It was originally made as part of an RPG Maker contest some years ago.
